name: NISSAN INTERNATIONAL
membership: ACEA, Business Europe, British Chamber of Commerce and Friends of Europe.
goal: Automotive issues monitoring. Cooperation with EU institutions in legislation drafting by bringing expertise, especially in consultations, impact assessments and implementation. Informing the company about upcoming legislation and product adaptation in line with upcoming reglementation. Representation of the company interests in associations or platforms relevant to activities.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- CO2 regulation for cars & vans
- European Strategy for low emission mobility
- Clean energy package
- Circular economy package
- Regulation on the approval and market surveillance of motor vehicle
- Regulation EC 661/2009 concerning type-approval requirements for the general safety of motor vehicles
- Connectivity & Autonomous Driving initiatives
